docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs
docs.text: For full documentation visit mkdocs.org.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Code example
docs.text:
An example of python code:

add_numbers.py
# Add two numbers
def add(n1, n2):
    return n1+n2

# Example of usage
result = add(2, 2)
print(result)

docs.title: Code Blocks in Content Tabs
Flowcharts
docs.text:
graph LR
  A[Start] --> B{Failure?};
  B -->|Yes| C[Investigate...];
  C --> D[Debug];
  D --> B;
  B ---->|No| E[Success!];

docs.title: Sequence Diagrams
docs.text:
sequenceDiagram
  autonumber
  Server->>Terminal: Send request
  loop Health
      Terminal->>Terminal: Check for health
  end
  Note right of Terminal: System online
  Terminal-->>Server: Everything is OK
  Terminal->>Database: Request customer data
  Database-->>Terminal: Customer data

docs.title: Jess
docs.text:
graph TD
  A[Me invita a su casa] --> B[Me invita a su cama]
  B --> C[+18]
  C --> D[Me hace el desayuno]
  D --> E[Netflix and chill]
  E --> F[+18]
  F --> G[Pizza rica]
  G --> E
  E --> H[Duchita]
  H --> I[Besito de despedida]
  I --> A

docs.title: Reference
docs.text:
A class to generate greeting messages.

Source code in dupy/greetings.py 
class Greeter:
    """
    A class to generate greeting messages.
    """

    def __init__(self, name: str):
        """
        Initialize the Greeter class with a name.

        Parameters
        ----------
        name : str
            The name of the person to greet.
        """
        self.name = name

    def greet(self) -> str:
        """
        Generate a greeting message.

        Returns
        -------
        str
            A greeting message including the name.
        """
        return f"Hello, {self.name}!"

docs.title: __init__(name)
docs.text: Initialize the Greeter class with a name.

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text:
name : str The name of the person to greet.

Source code in dupy/greetings.py 
def __init__(self, name: str):
    """
    Initialize the Greeter class with a name.

    Parameters
    ----------
    name : str
        The name of the person to greet.
    """
    self.name = name

docs.title: greet()
docs.text: Generate a greeting message.

docs.title: Returns
docs.text:
str A greeting message including the name.

Source code in dupy/greetings.py 
def greet(self) -> str:
    """
    Generate a greeting message.

    Returns
    -------
    str
        A greeting message including the name.
    """
    return f"Hello, {self.name}!"
